text: Mata kare-ra no nakaniha, yogen-sha o komara sete,`kare wa (tada no) mimidesu.' To iu mono ga aru. Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare wa anata gata no tame, yoi koto no kikitedearu, kare wa arrā o shinkō shi, shinja-tachi o shinrai suru. Mata anata gata no naka no shinkō suru mono no tame ni wa (arrā kara no) jihidearu. Arrā no shito o nayamasu mono ni wa, itamashī chōbatsu ga aru
